items.title: Manmohan Singh, Indian ex-PM and architect of economic reform, dies at 92
items.description: Manmohan Singh was instrumental in bringing India out of economic and nuclear isolation.

items.title: Finland investigates Russia 'shadow fleet' ship after cable damage
items.description: Finland is investigating a tanker following the rupture of a transmission cable in the Baltic Sea.

items.title: Israeli air strikes hit main Yemen airport
items.description: Israel claimed responsibility for the strikes, saying it had targeted Houthi "military infrastructure".

items.title: At least three killed in bus crash in Norway
items.description: The vehicle carrying dozens of people is reported to have ended up in a lake in the country's north-west.

items.title: Five Gaza journalists killed in Israeli strike targeting armed group
items.description: A Palestinian TV channel says they were in a marked media van in the central Gaza Strip.
